document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of Turkish Neuroptera with annotating on provincial distributions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of Turkish Neuroptera with annotating on provincial distributions

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks:
Distoleon kabulensis Hölzel, 1972
were previously recorded from by
Hölzel ( 1972 a)
in the part of type series from Elazıġ. But,
Aspöck et al ( 2001 )
forgot to cite the data of the paratype female in the catalogue of west Palearctic fauna.

Denizli (
Canbulat & Kıyak 2004
,
Canbulat & Kıyak 2005 b
); Elazıġ (
Özbay et al. 2005
).

Aġrı (
Hölzel 1972 a
,
1987
) Iġdır (
Arı 2004
).
